entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:14 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 01:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.0°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:10 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:10 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:10 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
